TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

Docs.summary: Represents a tag that contains ECMAScript that is run when the rule is matched.
Creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag.Script%2A> property contains an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string script) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag.Script%2A> property is set to the value in `script`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Script { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ECMAScript for the tag.
Docs.value: A string that contains the semantic interpretation script for the tag.
